title: AutoML Model Training
description: A real-time web application where users can upload their datasets and get the best model trained on it using AutoML techniques and can test the model and see visualizations and evaluation metrics.

title: Reasoning Checker
description: A web application for students and teachers to create quiz and solve them along with providing reasoning to the solution which is checked by LLM.

title: AI based traffic Management System
description: Project to adjust the traffic light timings according to the traffic density in each lane.

title: Product Selling Website with Django
description: A web application having admin panel and admin can add or delete the products with valid user authentication and authorization.

title: Expense Visualizer
description: A web interface where user can upload data in .csv or.xlsx format and will see the graph for that data.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my skills, projects and resume.
